p: Even though the most recent papers focus almost exclusively on its anti-HIV activity [ 134], BA showed promising results against other common viruses as well such as the herpes simplex virus (HSV). Phillips et al. reported that the ionic derivatives of betulinic acid displayed improved water solubility and a stronger antiviral activity against HSV type 2 compared with BA [ 135]. Moreover, in vitro studies on human lung carcinoma A549 cells revealed BAâ€™s capacity to inhibit the proliferation of an influenza virus strain in a dose-dependent manner [ 47].
